Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • frog.entities.Entity
      • frog.entities.Monster
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fly, Snake, Sorcerer

    public abstract class Monster
extends Entity
    A monster class where all monsters extend this class.
    Author:
    Jeremy Mills
